definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half

sentences.english: At that time, most of the deans and teachers of the department are my teachers.
sentences.chinese: 那时系里的主任和教师大半是我的老师。

sentences.english: At midnight my brother and nephew went to get fuel.
sentences.chinese: 大半夜里，我哥哥和外甥去弄燃油。

sentences.english: The students are, for the most part, from the villages.
sentences.chinese: 这些学生一大半来自农村。

sentences.english: The greater part of the project has been completed.
I was an atheist and evolutionist most of my life.
sentences.chinese: 我大半辈子都是个无神论进化论者。

sentences.english: She emptied more than half the rice into his bowl.
sentences.chinese: 她把大半碗米饭拨到他的碗里。

sentences.english: It cost the better part of his pay.
sentences.chinese: 这件东西花了他工资的一大半。

sentences.english: But the greater halfs all chance positive wife solid spoil of tool, fate how can not hard conclusion.
sentences.chinese: 却大半都成为正妻固宠的工具，命运如何无法定论。

sentences.english: The embarrassed idea that I feel in times before is anti- to disappear greater half at this time.
sentences.chinese: 这时我先前感觉的窘意反消失了大半。

sentences.english: Women once spent long hours grinding grain by hand.
sentences.chinese: 妇女曾经在手工研磨谷物上花上大半天的时间。

sentences.english: The technology to irradiate food has been around for the better part of a century.
sentences.chinese: 在大半个世纪以来辐照食品的技术变得愈加突出。

sentences.english: The door closed, the window is pulled on a half.
sentences.chinese: 屋门关着，窗户也拉上一大半。

sentences.english: There were many famous porcelain kilns at the time; each different kiln system produced varied styles of work.
sentences.chinese: 名瓷名窑遍及大半个中国，名窑形成不同风格的系统。

sentences.english: A majority of African-Americans cast their ballots for me.
sentences.chinese: 大半的黑人选民投票支持了我。

sentences.english: Verily We have brought the Truth to you: but most of you have a hatred for Truth.
sentences.chinese: 我确已把真理昭示你们，但你们大半是厌恶真理的。

sentences.english: For pretty much my entire life, she was a college math professor (and still is).
sentences.chinese: 在我的大半辈子里，她始终是一名大学的数学教授。

definition: a portion smaller than a half/the lesser part/the smaller part
almost/nearing completion/bits and piece/of all kinds
